src:
Uppgifter: FAM ökar i Munters när storägaren säljer av
Nordic Capital, största ägare i fukthanteringsbolaget Munters, vill sälja av 20 procent av kapitalet i bolaget. Det framgår av ett pressmeddelande. Enligt källor till Di kommer familjen Wallenbergs stiftelsebolag FAM att öka ägandet i bolaget.
05 Nov 2019, 16:50 by Victor Hultgren

text:
Tasks: FAM increases in Munters as the major owner sells off
Nordic Capital, the largest owner of the moisture management company Munters, wants to sell 20 percent of the capital in the company. This is stated in a press release. According to sources for Di, the Wallenberg family FAM foundation company will increase ownership in the company.
05 Nov 2019, 16:50 by Victor Hultgren
